Body:
Is there an annotation tool for linguistic structure that compares to @nnotate? One of the major features of annotate is the annotation is semi-automatic, i.e., it uses a language model to make annotation suggestions to the annotator. Unfortunately it is slightly outdated as it depends on Tcl/Tk 8.0.

Is there an annotation tool with a comparable feature set?
Title: Semi-automatic annotation tool like '@nnotate'
